static member YieldOperation : Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataLake.Analytics.IJobOperations * string * Guid -> unit

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The Azure Data Lake Analytics account to execute job operations on.
Job identifier. Uniquely identifies the job across all jobs submitted to the service.
Docs.summary: Pauses the specified job and places it back in the job queue, behind other jobs of equal or higher importance, based on priority. (Only for use internally with Scope job type.)
